DOC.brief_summary: Patients Fascititis plantaris , Achillodynie , Periarthropathia humerosacpularis calcarea Epikondylopathia humerus /radii get shock wave therapy clinic plan . During study investigator want ask pain , pain reduction function .
DOC.brief_title: Extracorporeal Shock Wave Treatment - Can Pain Reduced ?
DOC.detailed_description: Patients either Fascititis plantaris , Achillodynie , Periarthropathia humerosacpularis calcarea Epikondylopathia humerus /radii get shock wave therapy clinic rheumatology plan . During study investigator ask pain , pain reduction function ( questionnaire ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients : Fascititis plantaris , Achillodynie , Periarthropathia humerosacpularis calcarea Epicondylopathia humerus /radii , get shock wave therapy . Exclusion criterion : Anticoagulation , Sepsis
